backend/main.mo: Actor managing prompts, blog posts, user profiles, favorites, and access control with premium gating and admin‑only mutations.
backend/migration.mo: Defines stable canister state structure and a no‑op migration that returns existing state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a UI visibility feature to specific frontend files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles and design tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, lazy‑loaded pages, app layout, theme provider, and global toasts.
Login/logout button using Internet Identity with query cache clearing and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for first‑time users to submit their name and create a profile via backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/categories/Categ: Renders a grid of category cards that link to the library page with category filters.
frontend/src/components/categories/categ: Defines prompt categories with labels, descriptions, icons, and lookup utilities.
frontend/src/components/categories/Categ: Displays a category icon using a sprite sheet with calculated background positioning.
frontend/src/components/common/CopyButto: Button that copies given text to clipboard, showing success or error state briefly.
frontend/src/components/common/FormStatu: Displays loading, success, or error alerts based on form status.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Wraps pages with a header, footer, and main content area.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Site footer with links, branding, and copyright notice.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Responsive header with navigation, theme toggle, auth controls, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/prompts/Favorite: Button to add or remove a prompt from favorites, requiring authentication and handling premium errors.
frontend/src/components/prompts/PromptCa: Card showing prompt summary, badges, copy access, detail link, and favorite toggle.
frontend/src/components/prompts/PromptDe: Detailed prompt view with metadata, copy access, premium gating, instructions, and favorite toggle.
frontend/src/components/prompts/PromptFi: Search and filter controls for prompts by category, tier, and sort options with active filter indicators.
frontend/src/components/seo/Seo.tsx: Updates document title and meta description for SEO.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeProvi: Provides theme context and applies light, dark, or system theme to the document root with persistence in localStorage.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeToggl: UI dropdown allowing users to switch between light, dark, or system theme using ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Returns the current user's profile using the existing caller profile query.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value that updates after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and provides identity via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching prompts, profiles, admin status, and performing mutations like adding prompts or toggling favorites.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme color variables, transitions, and custom scrollbar styles.
frontend/src/lib/blogRouting.ts: Builds SEO-friendly blog post URLs and parses blog post IDs from route parameters.
frontend/src/lib/download.ts: Generates downloadable text files for individual or multiple prompts using Blob and temporary links.
frontend/src/lib/promptFilter.ts: Filters and sorts prompts based on search, category, tier, and popularity or recency.
frontend/src/lib/promptRouting.ts: Creates clean prompt URLs from titles and extracts prompt IDs from route strings.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Provides basic validation helpers for email, name, and message fields.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app by mounting providers for React Query and Internet Identity before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static About page describing PromptFarm AI with SEO metadata and styled content.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPromptsPage.tsx: Admin-only page for adding new prompts with validation and form submission to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/AuthPage.tsx: Handles user login via Internet Identity and redirects authenticated users to the dashboard, showing profile setup if needed.
frontend/src/pages/BlogIndexPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a grid of blog posts with titles, previews, and metadata.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Loads and renders a single blog post with navigation back to the blog list.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesPage.tsx: Displays a grid of prompt categories with SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact form page with validation and submission via a backend mutation.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: User dashboard showing favorites, membership info, and options like downloading saved prompts.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage with hero section, category previews, and feature highlights linking to main site areas.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipPage.tsx: Renders the membership plans page showing free and premium tiers, highlighting the user's current plan using profile data.
frontend/src/pages/NewsletterPage.tsx: Implements a newsletter subscription form with email validation, status feedback, and a call to the subscribe API.
frontend/src/pages/PromptDetailsPage.tsx: Loads and displays a single prompt's details based on URL params, handling loading and not‑found states.
frontend/src/pages/PromptLibraryPage.tsx: Fetches all prompts and applies search, filter, and sort options to render a browsable prompt library grid.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theming, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup for the project.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature tracking, and new prompt‑related requirements for the codebase.
